synopsis.text: On a cosmic scale, an enigmatic and colossal tank rocket embarks on a relentless quest, plundering precious resources from numerous planets. The Earth becomes entangled in this interstellar incident, resulting in the sudden disappearance of Yūna and Boogoo. Determined to rescue Yūna, Stitch forges an alliance with Tiira, a sophisticated information analysis robot hailing from the Galactic Federation. This thrilling space adventure features a special guest appearance by Yuu Aoi, who lends her talents to bring Tiira's character to life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
